title: Upgrade the commons-lang dependency
description:
The commons-lang dependency is more than 8 years old:

https://github.com/apache/lucene-solr/blob/master/solr/core/ivy.xml#L38

Please upgrade to the org.apache.commons one, or even better get rid of this dependency.

comments.content: Closing as duplicate. Please contribute to SOLR-9079 if you like to help resolve this
